channel.title: Summon-Pkz Client V4 - ALOT of items and GFX's added
channel.description:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/summonpkz2.png[/img]
Recently I havn't been very Active or coding very much, so I felt like making a Fourth Client, which would be 5x better than my last ones. The Previous clients I have Made had alot of bugs and problems with them, but with this client, I have decreased the bugs to a minimum, if not, no bugs at all. This one is also a smaller file, and alot faster to run.
Once I have finished Configuring my Server for My V4 client, and added the finishing touches to it, I will release my Server to go with this client, which will Include ALL the Features of my last Version of the server, plus ALOT more.
[u][b]General Features[/b][/u]
[ul][li]This is a 377 Client.[/li] [li]I have added about 10 New GFX's.[/li] [li]I have added 30+ Items to it.[/li] [li]This one has the Cache in the folder, along with the models.[/li] [li]New GameFrame, which is Very very nice.[/li] [li]Working Log-Out door[/li] [li]It is an OPEN Client, which means it has all the Java files included in the download[/li] [li]FULL Prayer HeadIcons, plus the Wilderness Skull.[/li] [li]GS Spec GFX's (Credits to Mr Gangster for Armadyl spec).[/li][/ul]
[u][b]New Items[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Full Void knight added.[/li] [li]Void knight Helmets added.[/li] [li]Full Saradomin Dragon hide armour.[/li] [li]Full Zamorak Dragon hide armour.[/li] [li]Full Guthix Dragon hide armour.[/li] [li]Full Mystic (The styled set).[/li] [li]All GodSwords, including the Saradomin Sword[/li][/ul]
There are alot more, I will list them later.
[b][u]New GFX's[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Armadyl GodSword Special attack GFX.[/li] [li]Saradomin GodSword Special attack GFX.[/li] [li]Bandos GodSword Special attack GFX.[/li] [li]There isn't that Stupid little GFX for The Zamorak GodSword that people claim to be the RS one, because it isn't, on RS the Zamorak GodSword special attack is the Barrage attack.[/li] [li]I have added the Quest SkillCape Emote GFX to this Client.[/li] [li]I have used the Summoning Skillcape emote GFX from Mr. Ganster's client, all credits to him for that.[/li][/ul]
Client Link is at the Bottom of this post (Which means you can look at the pictures on the way down :)).
[b][u]PICTURES[/u][/b]
Working Log-Out door: [img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Log-Outdoor.gif[/img]
Wilderness Skull:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/WildSkull.gif[/img]
Armadyl GodSword Special Attack GFX:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/AGSSpec.gif[/img]
Saradomin GodSword Special attack GFX:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Saraspec-1.gif[/img]
[b] I havn't taken pictures for the Bandos and Zamorak GodSword Special Attacks.[/b]
Quest SkillCape Emote GFX:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/quest.jpg[/img]
Prayer HeadIcons:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Prayer.jpg[/img]
Client BG:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Summon-Pkz-1.png[/img]
Client GameFrame:
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/GameFrame.jpg[/img]
[b]And the Virus scan:[/b]
[img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/Scan.jpg[/img]
[b]Download here:[/b]
[url=http://files.filefront.com/Summon+Pkz+Client+V4rar/;10935919;/fileinfo.html][img]http://i273.photobucket.com/albums/jj218/primadude/b_download_still.gif[/img][/url]
